entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: SourceTextTokenParser #72518
    17.10
  • Upgrading Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Common from 4.8.0 to 4.9.2 Causes Roslyn Analyzer to be Ignored and No Code Gen #72517
  • [VB]False-positive "Cast is redundant" for `DirectCast` #72505
    Backlog
  • Port existing low-level diagnostic service tests over to just testing through LSP #72504
  • The compiler doesn't flag errors in simple 'using' statements. #72496
    17.10

Closed

  • InterceptsLocation with generic return value does not work #72268
  • Missing member suggestions object initializer after target-typed constructor in collection expression for array #72400
    Backlog
  • Hashtags not being treated correctly in a raw string literal #72513
  • Custom `IEnumarable<T>.Add(IEnumerable<T>)` + Collection Initalizer causes `csc.exe` to crash #72461
  • Crash in params with interpolated string handler arguments #71488
    .NET 9
  • List SetCount/AsSpan optimization should produce a list with same capacity as List made with new/Add #72318
  • Missing nullability warnings in delegate conversions #72253
  • Remove `==`/`!=`/`=`/`<>` whose operands are bool value (true / false) and literal, or replace them with `!`/`Not` if necessary #72506
  • `nameof` for type-keywords causes CS1525 #72501

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge 'main' into RefStructInterfaces #72519
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Fix doc comment #72514
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Use the project cone information in Scope.FindAssetsAsync (part 2) #72512
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Adjust extension member lookup to prefer more specific members #72510
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Do not put an equals and quotes when completing an xml attribute if present #72508
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Expose semantic tokens functionality to Razor EA #72495
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Provide option to only update source-generators on special events (like a build) #72494
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Update Language Feature Status for Params Collections #72516
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections, Next
  • Add a unit test to ensure object initialisers supports completion in collection expressions #72515
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Merge 'features/ParamsCollections' into 'main' #72511
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections, Next
  • Move to scout queue #72493
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Use the project cone information in Scope.FindAssetsAsync #72509
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove portions of solution crawler #72147
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Better BlobBuilder pooling #72383
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Pack resource IDs and adjust Compiler Test Plan #72499
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Use the List(int) constructor if possible when lowering collection expressions #72427
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Adjust GetUnderlyingCollectionExpressionElement to handle params collections #72498
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Bind extensions in initializers of inferred locals #72398
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Fix logic in compilation tracker causing an assert #72492
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove workspace option #72490
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge 'main' into ParamsCollections #72497
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: IOperation and Add method with params array #72469
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Use ProvideSettingsManifest to specify Unfied Settings registration file #72429
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow VS Code to provide razor source geneator references. #72482
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Fix InvalidCastException when initializing the properties of an undeclared class inside a lambda function #72480
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.10
  • Exclude VS-related packages on non-Windows #72470
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Reduce File I/O under the AnalyzerAssemblyLoader folder #72412
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Implement GetInterceptorMethod public API #72279
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` (attempt 2) #71793
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Do not return nonexistent kinds in `SyntaxFacts`' methods #72264
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Suppress Lock conversion warnings when using object equality operators #72459
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lock Type
  • Make sure to meld string or char constants in expression in interpolated string into adjacent literal & Use `String.Concat` if possible in interpolated string in VB #72308
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Catch connection lost exceptions from shutting down while refresh req… #72491
    Area-IDE, untriaged
